mcq.statement: Which of the following was NOT a policy or achievement of Aurangzeb Alamgir?
mcq.one_liner: Aurangzeb Alamgir was known for his piety, enforcement of Islamic values, and success in developing the economy, but he was not known for promoting secularism.
